Login1.bodyText: Please Confirm your Country Code and Enter your Phone Number.
Login1.HelpModalMessage:
For using IraqPayment you must first login/create an account.
 In the input box below enter your county code and phone number and then press Next button.
Login1.modalRequestErrorBody:
It looks like there are problems with the inputs you entered.
Check them and try one more time.

Login2.bodyText: We've sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone:
Login2.expireText: Your code had been expired. Please go back and try again
Login2.HelpModalMessage:
For using IraqPayment you must first login/create an account.
 In the input box below enter verification code sent to you and then press Next button.
Login2.modalResponseWrongCodeErrorBody: You entered a wrong code. If you didn't received a code by sms, please go back and try one more time or call us for help.
Login2.modalResponseManyTriesErrorBody: You entered a wrong code many times. If you didn't received a code by sms, please go back and try one more time or call us for help.
Login2.modalResponseExpireCodeErrorBody: You entered an expired code. Please go back and try one more time or call us if you have any problems.

Login3.HelpModalMessage: Below you can see your IraqPayment Card. It's a unique card connected to your wallet. You can sahre it so that others can transfer money to you via card number or phone number.

Login4.bodyText: Please Enter your Name and Password for your Card:

Login4.HelpModalMessage: You must have a name and password for your wallet. You must enter them below to continue using IraqPayment!

ContactUs.title: Contact us
ContactUs.addressDetail: Xanuy 4, Garaky 211, Kolany 65 , Twemalek, Sulaymaniyah, Iraq

Home.title: خانه
Home.HelpModalMessage:
Iraq Payment main functionality lies in this page!
Here you can choose to buy charge, transfer money, pay bills and more.

Transactions.title: گزارش ها
Transactions.HelpModalMessage:
Here you can see your last 30 transactions.
If you want to see all of your transactions please contact us.

Profile.title: پروفایل
Profile.HelpModalMessage:
You can change your profile photo, name, address, etc.
You can also change your password and If you forget your password, you can restore it by going to one of our offices and get a temporary password. after that you can change your password by using temporary password.

You can buy SIM Charges, Transfer Money, Pay in stores and taxi and a lot more.

https://iraqpayment.com

AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.headerText: A better way to pay, by IraqPayment!
AboutUs.bodyText:
IraqPayment is an online payment system for Iraqi people.
  You can use IraqPayment for Mobile recharge, Money transfers, Shopping, Internet recharge, Bill payments and more.
  With IraqPayment, you can move money from your account to someone else’s within minutes;
  You can pay in lots of places – online, in stores, and more.
  It also offers mobile recharge for popular mobile operators (Asiacell, Korek and Zain) in Iraq.
